references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduced Mip-NeRF, a significant advancement in NeRF technology that addresses the aliasing issue and improves rendering quality, directly influencing the development of 3D Gaussian Splatting.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This is the foundational paper introducing 3D Gaussian Splatting, a method this paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Block-NeRF: Scalable large scene neural view synthesis
references.reason: This paper presents Block-NeRF, a method for efficiently handling large-scale scenes in NeRF, which inspired the divide-and-conquer approach used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Distributed optimization and statistical learning via the alternating direction method of multipliers
references.reason: This paper introduces the ADMM algorithm, a crucial optimization technique used in this paper for distributed training.

references.paper_title: Mega-NeRF: Scalable construction of large-scale NeRFs for virtual fly-throughs
references.reason: This paper introduces Mega-NeRF, another important large-scale NeRF method that this paper benchmarks against and compares to in terms of training efficiency and rendering quality.
